final.html: Edit your sites from anywhere on primocloud.io →

Develop and edit sites
like never before

Build reusable components, get TailwindCSS and your favorite
JS libraries out of the box, and author right on the page.
Creating a fully custom, easily editable site
shouldn’t be so complicated.
Now, it isn't.

primo is free and open source software

fields.value:

fields.label: Description

raw.html:
{{{heading}}}

{{{description}}}

primo is free and open source software

final.html:
Get to the code

Edit your site component-by-component (each with encapsulated styles) and use Tailwind out of the box alongside your favorite JS libraries with zero setup.

Edit with ease

Editing on the frontend isn't just for page-builders anymore. Write and edit text right on the page and add fields in seconds to easily edit structured content.

Create a component library

Create a new component, add it to your library, then place it anywhere on your site. And when you update it, every instance of it across your site gets updated too.

Build a static site

Everytime you publish your changes, primo builds a lightning-fast static site (with just HTML and CSS, plus a couple enhancements) which you can deploy to your host of choice.

Watch the walkthrough
primo is in public beta as of August 2020
Community | Terms | Privacy
©
